name: Run Away From Bullies
description:
Run Away From Bullies is a QTE-based action game about running away from your problems and facing your fears while crying about them. Our character is gifted with a special skill: the ability to enter Bullet Time when provoked, giving him more time to run away. Created in 46 hours for the 13th Creative Jam.

Sarah Boily : Artist

Laurent Caron : Programmer 

Audrey Germain : Programmer 

Hugo Palisson : Programmer 

Jared Snape : Programmer
